isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - ENGINE FRONT COVER AND/OR GASKET (V-8), REPLACE

wtsproc.wtsdescrip: ENGINE FRONT COVER AND/OR GASKET (V-8), REPLACE

step1.para: Chock wheels.
Disconnect battery.
Drain cooling system.
Drain engine oil. Remove oil filter.
Remove front bumper.
Disconnect necessary wiring to remove hood.
Remove hood assembly.
Remove charge air cooler pipes / hoses.
Remove and disconnect all coolant hoses necessary to remove complete radiator assembly.
Evacuate A/C system if applicable.
Disconnect A/C lines at condenser if applicable.
Remove all radiator assembly support struts.
Disconnect power steering hoses at reservoir. Catch fluid in container.
Install lifting device to radiator assembly.
Remove lower radiator support nut.
Tilt radiator assembly forward. Remove fan / clutch assembly using special tools. NOTE: Right hand threads.
Disconnect ground wire at radiator assembly.
Disconnect automatic transmission cooler lines at radiator if applicable. Cap ends.
Using lifting device, remove complete radiator assembly as one unit.
Remove fan drive belt.
Disconnect wiring from alternator. Remove alternator support bracket with alternator attached.
Remove belt tensioner.
Remove all hoses from front cover.
Remove coolant filter.
Remove water pump pulley and pump.
Remove crankshaft damper using puller.
Remove complete air compressor assembly with mounting bracket attached if applicable.
Remove complete oil pump assembly.
Disconnect wire connections from cam and E.C.T. sensors at front cover. Lay wire aside and secure.
Remove cam and E.C.T. sensors from front cover.
Syphon oil from high pressure oil pump reservoir.
Remove power steering pump. Lay aside and secure.
Disconnect oil line at high pressure oil pump reservoir.
Remove high pressure oil pump reservoir.
Remove high pressure oil pump inspection gear plate from front cover.
Remove bolt retaining high pressure oil pump gear. Remove gear.
Disconnect wiring from I.P.R.
Disconnect oil lines from high pressure oil pump.
Remove I.P.R.
Remove high pressure oil pump.
Remove bolts retaining oil cooler to front cover.
Remove bolts retaining front cover to engine block.
Install lifting device to engine. Raise engine and remove front engine mount.
Remove bracket retaining wire harness at starter. Reposition and secure harness out of way for access.
Remove bolts retaining front engine mount crossmember. Slide crossmember forward for oil pan clearance. NOTE: Bolts located at the top and bottom of frame rail edges.
Remove oil dip stick tube.
Remove bolts retaining oil pan. Remove oil pan using special tool to cut sealant.
Remove oil pick up tube from front cover.
Remove front cover with gasket.
Clean all mating surfaces.
Straighten oil pan edges.
Install water pump with new gasket to front cover. Torque bolts to spec. NOTE: Four (4) of the water pump bolts also retain the front cover to the crankcase.
Install new gasket onto front cover.
Install front cover. Torque bolts to spec to include (4) water pump bolts.
Install water pump pulley. Torque bolts to spec.
Install oil pick up tube and gasket. Torque bolts to spec.

para.emph: NOTE: before installation of oil pan, place pan in position with no sealant. Note how pan is positioned for installation as not to remove sealant from oil pan. Apply sealant to oil pan. Install oil pan. Torque bolts to spec. Install oil filter.

step1.para: Install oil dip stick tube.
Install front engine mount crossmember. Torque bolts to spec.
Install front engine mount. Torque bolts to spec. Remove lifting device from engine.
Install wire harness support bracket at starter.
Install new gasket to oil cooler. Install oil cooler to front cover. Torque bolts to spec.
Install high pressure oil pump. Torque bolts to spec.
Install I.P.R. to high pressure oil pump. Torque nut to spec. Connect wiring to I.P.R.
Install oil line to high pressure oil pump.
Install gear to high pressure oil pump. Torque bolt to spec. Check gear backlash.
Apply sealant to high pressure oil pump gear inspection plate. Install plate. Torque bolts to spec.
Install gasket and sealant to high pressure oil pump reservoir. Install reservoir. Torque bolts to spec.
Install oil line to high pressure oil pump reservoir.
Install power steering pump with new gasket. Torque bolts to spec.
Install cam and E.C.T. sensors. Connect wiring to sensors.
Install oil pump with new gasket. Torque bolts to spec.
If applicable, install air compressor assembly.
Replace front crankshaft oil seal using special tools.
Replace crankshaft damper wear sleeve. Install crankshaft damper. Apply sealant to damper washer. Torque bolt to spec.
Install all coolant hoses to front cover.
Install coolant filter.
Install belt tensioner. Torque bolt to spec.
Install alternator bracket with alternator attached. Connect wiring to alternator.
Install fan drive belt.
Install radiator assembly in position using lifting device. Connect ground wire to radiator assembly.
Install fan / clutch assembly using special tools.
Install all radiator support struts. Install lower radiator support nut. Remove lifting device.
If applicable, connect transmission oil cooler lines to radiator.
Connect power steering hoses to power steering reservoir.
Connect A/C condenser lines if applicable.
Connect all coolant hoses to radiator assembly.
Install charge air cooler pipes / hoses.
Install hood assembly. Connect wiring to hood assembly.
Install front bumper.
Fill cooling system. Fill engine oil.
Charge A/C system if applicable.
Connect battery.
Start engine and check for leaks.
Bleed power steering system.
Remove wheel chocks.
